challenges.name: SQL Injection: Authentication Bypass
challenges.description: A web store with an admin login form vulnerable to SQL injection. Bypass authentication to access the admin dashboard and retrieve the flag.

challenges.name: Business Logic: Substring Token Bypass
challenges.description: A secure gateway that requires an authentication token. The validation logic has a subtle flaw in how it checks for the token.

challenges.name: IDOR: Broken Access Control
challenges.description: A company portal where users can view their profiles and documents. The application has broken access control allowing horizontal privilege escalation.

challenges.name: Gatekeeper
challenges.description: A corporate employee portal with a multi-stage attack chain. The Flask application has multiple vulnerabilities to discover and exploit.

challenges.name: Insecure Deserialization: YAML Code Execution
challenges.description: A configuration loader service that accepts YAML input. The YAML parser has a deserialization vulnerability allowing remote code execution.

challenges.name: JWT Forgery: Algorithm Confusion
challenges.description: A REST API that uses JWT for authentication. Login credentials for a low-privilege user are provided. Exploit JWT weaknesses to escalate privileges.

challenges.name: SQL Injection: UNION-Based Session Leak
challenges.description: An employee directory with a department search field vulnerable to SQL injection. OR-based payloads are blocked â€” use UNION to extract session tokens.
